channel.title: Avatars
channel.description: You have kept the admins, mods, rep system(Kind of) ,most forums and a few other kaitnieks features.Why not the avatar?

item.title: Avatars
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

I want avatars </3

And signatures with images =]

Read full topic

item.title: Avatars
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“VG_Kobra, post:9, topic:48770”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=68371.msg820653#msg820653 date=1169771105]

Avatars would be a nice addition to the forum. I didn’t realize that I missed those from kait’s until just now.

How can you NOT miss being a Registered Hex Offender?

How could you not???

RichyTs avatar was my favorite. Does anyone have that one saved?
[/quote]

The Pirate Head? Idk, didn’t appeal to me much. If i had to pick it would be Squig’s Cat which was mercilessly {Insert Krichevskoy’s old signature}, my next favorite would be asdf’s, that eye thing he had going on was hypnotizing.[/quote]
Kaitnieks picked that out for Squig. I liked it <3

Remember when i edited it and made his cat dead/dieing?

Read full topic

item.title: Avatars

@moparisthebest wrote:

Thats why I am making another theme pwnd.

If anyone knows of a mod to have vB like avatars let me know.

item.title: Avatars
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:4, topic:48770”]SMF has avatar support, just not in the same way as vB did. You have to view the users profile in order to see the avatar. As time allows I am coding a new theme that is identical to the vB Satellite theme, that will allow for the use of avatars where I want to put them.[/quote]No, I’m pretty sure SMF has the same vB type system

Unless, of course, other forums have mods to do such. IMO, that green theme is ugly as balls (The SMF version we have).

Read full topic

item.title: Avatars
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

SMF has avatar support, just not in the same way as vB did. You have to view the users profile in order to see the avatar. As time allows I am coding a new theme that is identical to the vB Satellite theme, that will allow for the use of avatars where I want to put them.

Read full topic
